text: Tetrahydroxybenzenes or Benzenetetrols are a group of organic compounds which are tetrahydroxy derivatives of benzene. Tetrahydroxybenzene comes in three isomers: *1,2,3,4-Tetrahydroxybenzene *1,2,3,5-Tetrahydroxybenzene *1,2,4,5-Tetrahydroxybenzene {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |Systematic Name |1,2,3,4-Tetrahydroxybenzene |1,2,3,5-Tetrahydroxybenzene |1,2,4,5-Tetrahydroxybenzene |- |Structural Formula |120x120px |120x120px |120x120px |- |CAS Registry Number |642-96-6 |634-94-6 |636-32-8 |} All isomers share the molecular weight 142,11 g/mol and the chemical formula C6H6O4. Category:Phenols
title: Tetrahydroxybenzenes
